price: Dájúdájú A ti sọ àwọn āyah tó ń yanjú ọ̀rọ̀ kalẹ̀. Allāhu sì ń tọ́ ẹnikẹ́ni tí Ó bá fẹ́ sí ọ̀nà tààrà (’Islām).
arabic: لَّقَدۡ أَنزَلۡنَآ ءَايَٰتٖ مُّبَيِّنَٰتٖۚ وَٱللَّهُ يَهۡدِي مَن يَشَآءُ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: laqad anzalnā āyātin mubayyinātin wal-lahu yahdī man yashāu ilā ṣirāṭin mus'taqīmin
